meanings.definition: To stop using something as currency.
meanings.sent1: The government demonetizes old coins to introduce new ones.
meanings.sent2: The country demonetizes its old banknotes to prevent counterfeiting.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank demonetizes all the pennies and only accepts quarters now.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to demonetize her collection of foreign currencies surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The vending machine demonetizes the old tokens and only accepts new ones now.

meanings.definition: To remove the monetary value from something.
meanings.sent1: The company demonetizes the outdated stocks to make room for new products.
meanings.sent2: The online platform demonetizes low-quality content to improve user experience.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick demonetizes the paper money, turning it into confetti.
meanings.sent4: The economic crisis demonetizes the once valuable assets, leaving investors worried.
meanings.sent5: The artist demonetizes the old paintings by marking them as clearance items.
